entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
